price: 37.Tama koros gira keenit abtah tan Qansarih gibdah girak yawqeenim faxaanaah usun teetik yawqc mara hinnon, usun umman amok keenik kate wayta digaala-lon.
arabic: يُرِيدُونَ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمَا هُم بِخَٰرِجِينَ مِنۡهَاۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّقِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yurīdūna an yakhrujū mina al-nāri wamā hum bikhārijīna min'hā walahum ʿadhābun muqīmun
